conbody.p: The Remote Assignments module has an administrative mode for performing certain system maintenance operations. This mode is activated when you open the teacher interface when logged into Dialog Nibelung as the built-in user Admin.

ul.li: Perform garbage collection and cleanup in the cloud storage.
Check for available module updates and install them.
Management of all assignments and their publication instances, including viewing, export, filing to the archive, and removal.

conbody.note: Administrative mode is intended for maintenance purposes only. Creating and publishing of assignments, grading, commenting, and other operations regularly performed by the teachers in the course of working with the module, are not available in this mode.
conbody.p: A warning to that effect will be displayed whenever you access the Remote Assignments module as Admin user:
conbody.note: It is highly recommended that Admin user has a very strong password to prevent unauthorized access to assignments, publications, and student grades.
conbody.p: A special Maintenance tab will appear in the teacher interface main window (see ) in administrative mode. This tab contain actions available for system maintenance.
conbody.note: Assignments and their publications belonging to all the teachers are available in the administrative mode allowing to perform their export, (see sections , , and ), filing to the archive (see ), or removal (see and ).
conbody.p: Press the Cloud cleanup button that initiates garbage collection in the cloud storage, which in certain cases allows to increase available free space.
Cloud cleanup may take a fairly long time. During this time the window will be blocked and a progress bar displayed:
Press the Check for updates button to check if a new version of the Remote assignments module is available.
conbody.note: Don't forget that computer running the teacher interface in administrative mode must have an active internet connection to perform these maintenance operations.
conbody.p: A message will be displayed if an update is available ( ).
Press the Download button to start downloading the update.
A download progress box ( ) will appear.
Press Install after the download is finished to install Remote Assignments updates.
